trans-unit.source: Creates a multi selection check box group that can be dynamically created by binding the control to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 创建多选复选框组，该复选框组可以通过将控件绑定到数据源动态创建。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主题内容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#Introduction)
trans-unit.target: [介绍](#Introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Specifying List Layout](#SpecifyingListLayout)
trans-unit.target: [指定列表布局](#SpecifyingListLayout)

trans-unit.source: [Specifying List Items](#SpecifyingListItems)
trans-unit.target: [指定列表项](#SpecifyingListItems)

trans-unit.source: [Accessibility](#Accessibility)
trans-unit.target: [辅助功能](#Accessibility)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介绍

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control provides a multi selection check box group that can be dynamically generated with data binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件提供了可以使用数据绑定动态生成多选复选框组组。

trans-unit.source: It contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection with members corresponding to individual items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 它包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>与列表中的各项相对应的成员的集合。

trans-unit.source: To determine which items are checked, iterate through the collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> property of each item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定选中了哪些项，循环访问集合并测试<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>的列表中每个项的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also use multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control is easier for creating a set of check boxes using data binding, while the individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control gives you greater control over layout.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件是便于创建一组的复选框使用数据绑定，而各个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件为你提供了更好地控制布局。

trans-unit.source: Specifying List Layout
trans-unit.target: 指定列表布局

trans-unit.source: You can specify the way the list is displayed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatDirection%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定列表的方式通过使用显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatDirection%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For information about layout options, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关布局选项的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>枚举。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatDirection%2A> is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatDirection%2A> 设置为 `RepeatDirection.Vertical`。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` renders the list horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`水平呈现列表。

trans-unit.source: Some <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> settings do not allow horizontal layout.
trans-unit.target: 某些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>设置不允许水平布局。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> 枚举。

trans-unit.source: Specifying List Items
trans-unit.target: 指定列表项

trans-unit.source: To specify items that you want to appear in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control, place a `ListItem` element for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要在中显示的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制，请将放`ListItem`元素开始标记和结束标记之间的每个条目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control also supports data binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件还支持数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: To bind the control to a data source, first create a data source, such as one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> objects, that contains the items to display in the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要将控件绑定到数据源，请先创建的数据源，如之一<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>对象，它包含用于显示控件中的项。

trans-unit.source: Next, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to bind the data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>方法来绑定到数据源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> properties to specify which field in the data source to bind to the `Text` and `Value` properties of each list item in the control, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>属性以指定要绑定到数据源中哪个字段`Text`和`Value`的每个列表的属性在控件中，分别项目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control will now display the information from the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件现在将显示数据源的信息。

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> property of each item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定中的选定的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件，循环访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合并测试<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>集合中每个项目的属性。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 可访问性

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance (in pixels) between the border and contents of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单元格的边框和内容之间的距离(以像素为单位)。

trans-unit.source: The distance (in pixels) between the border and contents of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的边框和内容之间的距离(以像素为单位)。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 -1，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来控制单元格的内容和中的单元格的边框之间的间距<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell with the height of the tallest cell and width of the widest cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的填充量添加到具有最高的单元格的高度和宽度中最宽的单元格的单元格的所有四个边<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The resulting cell size is applied uniformly to all cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 最终的单元格大小统一应用于中的所有单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件。

trans-unit.target: 指定列表控件中项的位置的序号索引。

trans-unit.target: 检索列表控件中指定索引位置的指定项类型的样式。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>要检查或设置用于控件以及其列表项的样式特性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control contains a footer section.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控件是否包含页脚部分的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />, indicating that a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> does not contain a footer section.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />，指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 不包含页脚部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.HasFooter%2A> property is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.HasFooter%2A>属性主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>类。

trans-unit.source: Footers are not supported when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.UnorderedList> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.OrderedList>.
trans-unit.target: 页脚不支持时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.UnorderedList>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.OrderedList>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control contains a heading section.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控件是否包含标题部分的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />, indicating that a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> does not contain a heading section.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />，指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 不包含标题部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.HasHeader%2A> property is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.HasHeader%2A>属性主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>类。

trans-unit.source: Headers are not supported when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.UnorderedList> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.OrderedList>.
trans-unit.target: 标头并不支持时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.UnorderedList>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.OrderedList>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control contains a separator between items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控件是否包含列表中项之间的分隔符的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />, indicating that a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> does not contain separators.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 不包含分隔符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.HasSeparators%2A> method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.HasSeparators%2A>方法主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>类。

trans-unit.source: Separators are not supported when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.UnorderedList> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.OrderedList>.
trans-unit.target: 分隔符不支持时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.UnorderedList>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.OrderedList>。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control, used to index the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> specified in the <c>postCollection</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 控件的键标识符，用于对 <c>postCollection</c> 参数中指定的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> 进行索引。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> that contains value information indexed by control identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 包含由控件标识符索引的值信息的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes the posted data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 处理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控件的已发布数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> is different from the last posting; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 的状态不同于上次发布的状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A> method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A>方法主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A> method indicates whether the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A>方法指示是否的状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制已更改。

trans-unit.source: In other words, it determines whether each list item in the control has the same <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> value as the last posted value.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，它确定是否在控件中的每个列表项具有相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>上次发布的值的值。

trans-unit.source: A user selecting or clearing an item in the control changes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> property value for the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 用户选中或清除控制更改中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>相应的属性值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>对象在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件。

trans-unit.source: If the same list items are selected in the control, or if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> is disabled, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在控件中，选择了相同的列表项，或者如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>处于禁用状态，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A>返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A> method returns `true` for a control, the page framework invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method for the control.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A>方法返回`true`用于控件，页面框架调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control prior to rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: 在客户端上呈现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控件之前对该控件进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender%2A> method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender%2A>方法主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender%2A> method allows derived classes to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender%2A>方法允许派生的类来处理<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>事件而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender%2A> method performs any necessary prerendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender%2A>方法执行之前保存视图状态和呈现内容的任何必要预呈现步骤<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>。

trans-unit.source: The individual list items contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control are initialized for rendering using the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的各列表项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件初始化为使用当前的呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.CreateControlStyle%2A> method in a custom server control so that it always returns a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle> class for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.CreateControlStyle%2A>方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便它始终返回的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle>类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the ASP.NET application that the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通知 ASP.NET 应用程序 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控件的状态已更改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>类。

trans-unit.source: The page framework calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A> method indicates that the state of the list items have changed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 页面框架调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A>方法指示列表项的状态已更改在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A> method to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>方法来引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A> method to perform custom processing when the user selects or clears list items in the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件开发人员可以重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>方法以执行自定义处理，当用户选择或清除列表控件中的项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method can optionally perform validation before raising the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> event for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法还可以选择执行之前引发验证<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged>控件事件。

trans-unit.source: To validate a group of controls on the page when a list item within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> is selected, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A> properties to `true`, and specify the group of controls to validate in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证的一组中的列表项时页上的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>选择时，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`true`，，指定要在验证控件的组<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that contains the output stream for rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: 包含用于在客户端上进行呈现的输出流的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Displays the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> on the client.
trans-unit.target: 在客户端上显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.Render%2A> method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.Render%2A>方法主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.Render%2A> implementation for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo> object for the list, and calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A> method, which in turn uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RenderItem%2A> method to render individual check box list items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.Render%2A>实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo>对象列表中，并调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A>方法，反过来使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RenderItem%2A>方法呈现单个复选框列表项。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.Render%2A> method in a custom server control so that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> always displays an image.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.Render%2A>自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>始终显示图像。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType" /> 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: An ordinal index that specifies the location of the item in the list control.
trans-unit.target: 指定列表控件中项的位置的序号索引。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo" /> object that represents the information used to render the item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于呈现列表中项的信息的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: 表示在客户端上呈现 HTML 内容的输出流的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Renders a list item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 呈现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控件中的列表项。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.Render%2A> implementation for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A> method, which in turn uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RenderItem%2A> method to render individual checkbox list items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.Render%2A>实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A>方法，反过来使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RenderItem%2A>方法来呈现列表项的各个复选框。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RenderItem%2A> method for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control ignores the `itemType` and `repeatInfo` parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RenderItem%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件将忽略`itemType`和`repeatInfo`参数。

trans-unit.source: The `repeatIndex` value is used to select the checkbox list item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection, and the selected list item is rendered to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: `repeatIndex`值用于选择中的复选框列表项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合，并且选择的列表项呈现到输出流。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control is rendered when the data source has no data or the control is not data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示数据源没有数据或控件未进行数据绑定时是否呈现控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is rendered when the data source has no data or the control is not data-bound; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件被回报，当数据源没有数据，或者控件不是数据绑定，则为<see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns to display in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控件中显示的列数。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns to display in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控件中显示的列数。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="0" />, which indicates this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="0" />，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.Table>, you can use this property to specify the number of columns that display in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.Table>，你可以使用此属性指定在中显示的列数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control displays all list items in a single column.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件单个列中显示所有列表项。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatColumns%2A> property to specify that two columns are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control displays vertically or horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指示控件是垂直显示还是水平显示的值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Vertical" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="Vertical" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the display direction of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性指定的显示方向<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns that are displayed is always determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatColumns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 显示的列数始终由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatColumns%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical` and if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.Table>, the first column is filled from top to bottom, then the next column, and so on until all items are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Vertical`如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.Table>，第一列填充从上到下，然后下一列，依次类推直到呈现出所有项。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatColumns%2A> property is set to `3`, the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control are displayed in three columns, as in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatColumns%2A>属性设置为`3`中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件显示三个列，如下所示下表中。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` and if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.Table>, the first column is filled from top to bottom, then the next column, and so on until all items are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.Table>，第一列填充从上到下，然后下一列，依次类推直到呈现出所有项。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatColumns%2A> property is set to `3`, the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control are displayed in rows of three items each, as in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatColumns%2A>属性设置为`3`的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件中的三个项，每行显示下表中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text alignment for the check boxes within the group.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置组中复选框的文本对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="Right" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify whether the text associated with the check boxes appears on the left or right of the check box.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于指定是否与对应的复选框关联的文本将显示在左侧或右侧的复选框。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `TextAlign.Right`, the text is displayed to the right of the check box.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`TextAlign.Right`，右侧的复选框会显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `TextAlign.Left`, the text is displayed to the left of the check box.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`TextAlign.Left`，左边的复选框会显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.TextAlign%2A> property to specify that the text associated with the check boxes appears on the right side of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.TextAlign%2A>属性以指定复选框与关联的文本显示在右侧<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件。
